text: Princess Kateryna Ostrozka (, , ) (1560–1579) was a Ruthenian noblewoman. She was famed for the Siege of Dubna in 1577, which was sieged by nomads with the purpose of take to her prisoner. She married Krzysztof Mikołaj "the Thunderbolt" Radziwiłł on 22 July 1578 in Dubno. ==See also== * House of Ostrozky * List of szlachta ==External links== * Liubomyr Vynar. Ostrozky in the Encyclopedia of Ukraine, vol. 3 (1993) * Ostrogski family Category:1560 births Category:1579 deaths Kateryna 1560
title: Katarzyna Ostrogska (1560–1579)
